Metadata: COMMERCIAL CAMPGROUNDS ON THE OREGON COAST: Characteristics and financial status
ORESU-T-77-002; Agricultural Experiment Station Circular of Information 659

The economic study of camping facilities on the Oregon Coast indicates that policies used in the public sector have a direct impact on the private campground industry. The objectives of this study are: 1. To report general characteristics of the private campground industry on the Oregon Coast; 2. To present basic cost and revenue data for selected private campgrounds as a indication of the economic condition of firms in the industry.
